function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2contaminated aerosols","Impact":"Increased risk of illness transmission","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation and dilution rate","Technologies":"HVAC systems with proper ventilation configurations","People":"Occupants of nonmedical settings/buildings","Owner":"Building managers and maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Contagious individuals or frequent sneezing in a space","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement proper ventilation and air exchange, encourage the use of face masks, maintain hygiene","Technologies":"HVAC systems with proper ventilation configurations, face masks, hand sanitizers","People":"Occupants of the space","Owner":"Occupants and management of the space"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in nonmedical settings","Impact":"Higher concentration of air contaminants and increased disease transmission risk","Mitigation":"Proper use, maintenance, and cleaning of ventilation systems, increase dilution rate, bring in outside air, open windows and doors for natural ventilation","Technologies":"Proper ventilation systems, regular maintenance, opening windows and doors","People":"Occupants of nonmedical settings/buildings","Owner":"Building managers and maintenance staff"}]}
